Essential Tips for 4 Nights 5 Days Bali Tour Package

DURATION

4 Nights 5 Days

HOTEL CATEGORY

4 / 5 Star

PICKUP & DROP

Delhi/Mumbai/Bengaluru/Chennai

EXPERIENCE

Premium

Experience the magic of Bali with our meticulously curated tour package, designed to showcase the best of this captivating island paradise. From cultural immersion to beachside relaxation, embark on a journey filled with unforgettable moments and lifelong memories.

Elevate Your Wonderful Experiences of 4 Nights 5 Days Bali Tour Package

Choose our 4 Nights 5 Days Bali Tour Package to explore the grandeur and charm of this incredible state.

Itinerary for Our 4 Nights 5 Days Bali Tour Package

DAY 1

Arrival to Bali Airport

  • Arrival in Bali from India.
  • Welcome with flower garland.
  • Transfer to Hotel in Kuta.
  • Free and leisure time to relax after the journey.

DAY 2

Bali Beaches with Uluwatu Sunset Tour and Kecak Ramayana Dance

  • Breakfast at the hotel.
  • Tanjung Benoa Beach for water sports activities such as banana boat rides, jet skiing, or parasailing.
  • Visit Glass Bottom and Turtle Island.
  • Explore Bali Collection Shopping Mall for souvenirs.
  • Relax at Mengiat Beach.
  • Visit Pandawa Beach.
  • Explore Uluwatu Temple.
  • Enjoy the Kecak Ramayana Dance performance during sunset at Uluwatu.

DAY 3

UNESCO Heritage Sites with Tanah Lot Sunset Tour

  • Breakfast at the hotel.
  • Visit Handara Gate for photos.
  • Explore the UNESCO Heritage Site of Ulun Danu Beratan Temple (Lake Beratan).
  • Visit a Chocolate Factory.
  • Experience the Spice Garden with a coffee plantation or mini-garden tour.
  • Explore the UNESCO Heritage Site of Tanah Lot Temple and enjoy the sunset.
  • Return to the hotel in Bali.

DAY 4

Bali Swing with Ubud Tour

  • Breakfast at the hotel.
  • Visit Tegenungan Waterfall for a refreshing dip.
  • Experience the Bali Swing package, including various swings and photo spots.
  • Explore Ubud Traditional Market for shopping (if time permits).
  • Self-check-in at a hotel in Ubud.

DAY 5

Departure from Bali to India

  • Breakfast at the hotel.
  • Check-out from the hotel.
  • Transfer to the airport for your flight back to India.

Inclusions

  • 02 nights stay at Hotel Kuta.
  • 02-night stay at Ubud.
  • Return Hotel Transfer, Return Fast Boat to Island.
  • Tours as per the above program include an Entrance Ticket, a Private AC Car (Toyota Avanza Car), English Speaking Driver, and a Parking Ticket.
  • Travel Insurance for all travelers.
  • Meals as mention on the program above (B = Breakfast).

Exclusions

  • 5% GST.
  • 5% TCS
  • Donation Fees of 1 + 2 = 3 USD at Gili island
  • Any Medical Test
  • Visa on Arrival
  • Airfares
  • Tourism Tax
  • Meals: L = Lunch, D = Dinner
  • Personal Expenses
  • Cidomo (Local Transport by Horse in Gili)

Easy Cancellation
*31 days or more prior to departure date, Initial Booking Amount and additional amount of visa fee will be forfeited (in case visa has been applied).*Between 30–16 days : 75% of total tour cost will be charged as penalty. *Less than 15 days: 100% of total tour cost will be charges as penalty.

High Season
Prices can fluctuate during peak season dates.

Travel Validity
The deal is valid for travel till 30 Sep 2024.

Visa Easy
Visa assistance will be provided by our visa specialist.

Booking Policy
– Initial Booking Amount – 30% per person or cancellation charges whichever is higher (non-refundable and non-transferable)
– 24 hours prior to the departure date – 70% of the remaining tour cost.
– For Issuance of the Flight Tickets, we require Full Payment of Airfare.
– Non- Refundable Services in the tour package have to be paid in full at the time of Booking.
– Payment Policy is non-negotiable and has to be paid accordingly.

Hear what our client says ❤️ ..

The 4 Nights 5 Days Bali Tour Package exceeded our expectations. It offered beauty, luxury, and coastal beauty. Highly recommended!

Mr. Rajkamal Jaiswal

Enquire Now
